image.altText: Benjamin Netanyahu gesticulates at a media conference with the Israel flag behind him

items.synopsis: While refraining from calling it a ground invasion, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says they have entered the second stage of the war in Gaza.

title.children: Israel says it has entered 'the second stage of war' on Gaza Strip

image.altText: Jesse Kriel celebrates Springboks winning rugby World Cup final

items.synopsis: South Africa completes a successful defence of its crown with a tense 12-11 victory over the All Blacks, who played much of the final without captain Sam Cane after he was sent off in Paris.Â Follow all the action in our live blog.

title.children: Springboks defeat gallant All Blacks to claim record fourth Rugby World Cup

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: A furious battle at the scrum ends with the Springboks tying the ball up and Wayne Barnes blowing time! The Springboks win a classic 12-11.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: THE SPRINGBOKS WIN THE WORLD CUP

children.content: A furious battle at the scrum ends with the Springboks tying the ball up and Wayne Barnes blowing time!

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: Mark Tele'a has a burst through midfield! The All Blacks look wide and want to move the ball there through Anton Lienert-Brown! Cheslin Kolbe with a deliberate knock on though! The All Blacks keep going forward but they have a penalty on half way. We're going to come back for that. It's 49 metres out. Cheslin Kolbe has gone to the bin! We'll end this game 14 vs 14.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: 73' Cheslin Kolbe sent to the sin bin

children.content: Mark Tele'a has a burst through midfield!
The All Blacks look wide and want to move the ball there through Anton Lienert-Brown!
Cheslin Kolbe with a deliberate knock on though!
The All Blacks keep going forward but they have a penalty on half way.
We're going to come back for that. It's 49 metres out.
Cheslin Kolbe has gone to the bin!

liveBlogPostPrepared.plaintext: Mark Tele'a is a super star! The maul defence is superb from the Springboks, but eventually they give away the penalty. The All Blacks spin the ball left to centre field, the Boks defence is a green wall - impenetrable. Until the cross big pass out wide from Jordie Barrett to Mark Tele'a. He beat one, two, three tacklers and then scooped the ball along the ground to Beauden Barrett, who dived over in the corner! Richie Mo'unga misses the conversion, the difference is just a point, 11-12.
liveBlogPostPrepared.title: 58'  Try New Zealand!

children.content: Mark Tele'a is a super star!
The maul defence is superb from the Springboks, but eventually they give away the penalty.
The All Blacks spin the ball left to centre field, the Boks defence is a green wall - impenetrable.
Until the cross big pass out wide from Jordie Barrett to Mark Tele'a.
He beat one, two, three tacklers and then scooped the ball along the ground to Beauden Barrett, who dived over in the corner!
Richie Mo'unga misses the conversion, the difference is just a point, 11-12.
